elements.name: supplyChainManagementEnvironmentURL
elements.label: Supply Chain Management environment URL
elements.toolTip: URL of the target Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management environment (example: https://contoso-uat.sandbox.operations.dynamics.com/)

elements.name: enabledScenarios
elements.label: Enabled scenarios
elements.toolTip: Enabled scenarios will have their corresponding Azure Stream Analytics job started during deployment. Keep unselected if the scenario is not needed to avoid incurring any costs.

allowedValues.label: Equipment downtime
allowedValues.description: Get notified when equipment scheduled to run stops for a designated amount of time

allowedValues.label: Product quality
allowedValues.description: Get notified if product quality falls below your specifications

options.text: Each enabled scenario incurs a cost by starting the associated Azure Stream Analytics job.

elements.name: existingIotHubSelector
elements.label: Existing Azure IoT Hub
elements.toolTip: Select an existing Azure IoT Hub to reuse (for instance, if one is available from a previous CFS deployment).
